title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: The return-to-office battle is jeopardizing the new American Dream: staying at home
items.description: The COVID-19 pandemic did spur more Americans to stay home, but also accelerated ongoing trends.

items.title: Canadian politician claims Trump admin's '51st state' rhetoric is an 'act of war'

items.title: A bubble tea chain and a toy doll are the latest casualties of Beijing and Hanoi’s competing claims over the South China Sea
